name: @sgf/system-governance-framework
description: Framework-as-Code for modern software governance: CI/CD, security scanning, and quality enforcement
author: 4-b100m

scripts.version:bump:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && cat package.json | jq -r .version > VERSION
scripts.version:bump:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && cat package.json | jq -r .version > VERSION
scripts.version:bump:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && cat package.json | jq -r .version > VERSION
